name: Chateau de la Villaine

reviews.title: Lovely property in the Loire
reviews.text: My family of 5 stayed at the Chateau de la Villaine for two nights in July 2006. We shared the largest room, the "Gentilhomme", which has views over the extensive grounds. The grounds around the chateau (essentially a large house) are very pretty and offer opportunities for exporing, tennis, and even fishing.

reviews.title: Fantastic vacation site
reviews.text: The property's biggest asset are the Dutch hosts, Adrian and Joke Gips. They are charming, gracious, and speak flawless French and English (and Dutch, I presume).

description: Be a guest in our charming B&B Chateau near to all the well known Loire Valley Castles.Within half an hour drive you can reach Tours, Amboise, Clos Luce, Chenonceau, Loches, Villandry, Azay le Rideau, Langeais and Cande.Within an hour drive you reach Saumur, Fontevrau, Chinon, Ussay, Montpoupon, Montresor, Cheverny, Beauregards, Blois, Chaumont and Chambord.
